extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Configuration
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the CVE by verifying the Cisco WLC Software Release and macfilter radius compatibility configuration.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the CVE?
Which macfilter configuration is in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Reset macfilter radius compatibility to default
extracted_playbook.description: For environments without macfilters, reset the macfilter radius compatibility mode to the default value.

extracted_playbook.title: Modify macfilter compatibility for environments with macfilters
extracted_playbook.description: For environments with macfilters, modify the macfilter compatibility to either cisco or free.
